    • communicate

      public java.lang.String communicate​(Address address, java.lang.String code, double val, java.lang.String body) throws java.lang.Exception
      communicate is the main function of Communicator (should be reprogrammed at each use) it is modeled after the TCP protocol, in the sense that it expects an "ACK"
      Specified by:
      communicate in interface CommunicationI
      Parameters:
      address - the address of the sender
      code - the code of the operation
      val - a useful numerical value used in diffrent cases
      body - the ody of the message
